title: Rail - Great 80's Metal
description:
This is an awesome band from the 80&#039;s and I never really understood why they didn&#039;t become more successful than they did.  Anyway, I own this on vinyl, cassette, and now CD, so I thought I would share the CD quality stuff for those of you in my same predicament buying the same titles two or three times at FULL fucking price.

If you&#039;re new to RAIL, and you like what you hear, then I would urge you to buy the albums off the web to support the band.  Haha - maybe we can get these guys to tour again before retro is too out of style!

There are two albums here: "Arrival Special Edition" and "Adio Special Edition".

Track Listings for Adio

1. 1-2-3-4 Rock &#039;N&#039; Roll  
2. Fantasy  
3. You&#039;ve Got to Give  
4. Hard Girl to Love  
5. Another Side of Blue  
6. Live With the Wind  
7. Diamond Dasher  
8. Her Majesty  
9. Way  
10. Speed Limit  
11. Don&#039;t Take Your Love Away  
12. Turn Out the Lights  
13. Kings and Queens  
14. Song of Solomon  

Track Listings for Arrival:

1. Hello  
2. Yes I Am  
3. Cheater  
4. Backseat Lovers  
5. Gangbusters  
6. Make Me  
7. Bandit  
8. Sirens  
9. Seasons of Change  
10. Forever Yours
11. Wizard
12. Two Fisted Night
13. Rockin&#039; You
14. My Lovin&#039; Is With You
15. You&#039;ve Got a Lot to Live
16. Gangbusters [Live]
